'''Peter Leo McKenzie''' ([[10 August]] [[1943]] - [[9 September]] [[2023]]<ref>[https://notices.nzherald.co.nz/nz/obituaries/nzherald-nz/name/peter-mckenzie-obituary?id=53081848 Peter McKENZIE Obituary] (New Zealand Herald 13.9.2023); [https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/262257802/peter-leo-mckenzie Peter Leo McKenzie] (Find a Grave).</ref>) was a New Zealand horse trainer and breeder and a part-time actor.<ref>[https://www.racecafe.co.nz/forums/index.php?/topic/101342-peter-mckenzie-rip/ Peter McKenzie RIP] (rdytdy, Race Cafe 12.9.2023).</ref> He played [[Elendil]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.

Peter McKenzie was the father of [[Bret McKenzie]].
